assertion: When I won the Pirates of the Caribbean Sandcastle Competition, Keith Richards was so angry he stamped on my drawbridge and threw Johnny Depp's bucket in the sea.
Last year whilst house-sitting for friends, I had to shout for help for two hours when I got stuck in their children's Wendy house.
I have drunk rum from a human skull.
I have vomited in Cliff Richard's hedge.
I once ruined a christening party when I was overheard calling the baby ugly on a baby monitor.
Possession: This is a hat from my hat collection. I wear one whenever I throw a dinner party.
Me and my husband have a fake laugh that we do at parties to signal when it's time to leave.
Possession: This is my conversation book. In it I've written a list of topics that I refer to should I ever run out of things to talk about.
For one week I appeared in a Dear Deidre photo casebook in The Sun newspaper.
